TABLE.NAME: stickynotes
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the stickynotes activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: colors
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if colors for sticky notes are enabled

FIELD.NAME: votes
FIELD.COMMENT: Check the type of vote enabled

FIELD.NAME: limitvotes
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, limits the number of votes per user

FIELD.NAME: maxlimitvotes
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, set the max number of votes per use.

FIELD.NAME: limitstickynotes
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if a max number of sticky notes per user is enabled

FIELD.NAME: maxstickynotes
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of maximum sticky notes per user

FIELD.NAME: orderstickynotes
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines how sticky notes are ordered from newest to oldest (or inverse) or by numer of votes

FIELD.NAME: viewauthor
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, managers and teachers will see authors

FIELD.NAME: rotate
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, notes will have a random rotation effect.

FIELD.NAME: color1
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 1 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color1_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 1 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: color2
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 2 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color2_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 2 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: color3
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 3 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color3_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 3 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: color4
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 4 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color4_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 4 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: color5
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 5 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color5_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 5 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: color6
FIELD.COMMENT: Check if color 6 is used.

FIELD.NAME: color6_meaning
FIELD.COMMENT: If used, gives meaning for the use of color 6 in the activity.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

TABLE.NAME: stickynotes_column
TABLE.COMMENT: Informations about columns in sticky notes activities

FIELD.NAME: stickyid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the sticky notes activity

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the column

FIELD.NAME: column_order
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the order position of the column

FIELD.NAME: stickyid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the activity

FIELD.NAME: stickycolid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the related column

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who created the note

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: Content of the note

FIELD.NAME: color
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the background color

FIELD.NAME: ordernote
FIELD.COMMENT: Order number in column

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the note was added

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the note was modified

FIELD.NAME: stickyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Instance ID

FIELD.NAME: stickynoteid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the note

FIELD.NAME: vote
FIELD.COMMENT: Content of the vote, depends on the type of vote defined in table stickynotes

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who voted

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the vote was added or modified
